column2: Euro area 20 (fixed composition) as of 1 January 2023 - Net lending (pos) / net borrowing (neg) - Balance (Credits minus Debits) - counterpart area: World (all entities, including reference area, including IO), counterpart sector: Total economy, Current prices, Standard valuation based on SNA/ESA - Domestic currency (incl. conversion to current currency made using a fixed parity); ratio to the annual moving sum of gross domestic product, Neither seasonally adjusted nor calendar adjusted - ESA 2010
